plot: Eric and Margo make last preparations for the Fall showing at Forrester Creations. Eric then surprises Kristen that not only will "her" design be the showstopper, but he also wants his daughter to model the gown. Kristen is stunned, but also begins to get concerned. Can she really trust Clarke as she will pass off his design as a Forrester original? Clarke is thrilled for Kristen's and his big break. Donna informs Tommy that she will pose for the nude photos under one condition: she wants to speak to the publisher upfront. In Tucson, Stephanie and Conway ponder why Stephen Logan left home and stayed away all these years. She is highly nervous that her own marriage depends on the fact that Mr. Logan will want to reunite with his family. Stephanie decides to send the Logan family an anonymous letter about Stephen.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
